类 Parser

extends java.lang.Object
    The message parsing class, parse the message from byte array.

    0.0.1

      • parseRespBuf

        public static java.lang.String[] parseRespBuf(byte[] buf)
                                       throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Method to parse the message body in byte array.
        参数:
        buf - The message body in byte array.
        返回:
        The Message body in String.
        抛出:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • deleteSpliter

        public static java.lang.String deleteSpliter(java.lang.String origin,
                                             java.lang.String split)
        Method to delete the "\n" spliter in message start and end.
        参数:
        origin - The String of message whole.
        返回:
        The String erased the head and end "\n".

      • composeMesArray

        public static java.lang.String[] composeMesArray(java.lang.String[] originMes)
        Method to compose the message String array, erasing the "\n".
        参数:
        originMes - The origin message string array.
        返回:
        The string array erased of "\n".
